title: Back-End Software Engineer
profile: Backend Developer proficient in Spring Boot / Java, focused on quality and continuous learning. Curious, autonomous, and adaptable to any environment, I design efficient and meaningful solutions with a strong understanding of business logic.

experience.description: Migrated the Member Area system of the Social Works Foundation to a modern React/Redux and Spring Boot architecture secured with JWT. Implemented production deployment automation using Docker and GitLab CI/CD

Designed and developed the Employee Leave Management System at NTT DATA, building RESTful APIs with Spring Boot and implementing OAuth2 authentication with Azure. Focused on optimizing back-end performance and reliability while ensuring seamless integration with the front-end

education.institution: Faculty of Science, Abdelmalek Essaadi University

education.degree: Bachelor in Mathematics and Computer Science
education.institution: Faculty of Science, Abdelmalek Essaadi University

projects.name: E-commerce Application
projects.description: E-commerce web application using Spring Boot and Angular with hexagonal architecture, Kafka, custom Spring Security with AOP, JWT, OAuth2, Swagger, PostgreSQL, and Redis.

projects.name: School Management Application
projects.description: School management web application using JEE and JWT (grades, attendance, library, results).

projects.name: Hotel Booking Application
projects.description: Back-end development of a hotel booking application using Laravel, Eloquent ORM, database migrations, and Laravel Passport authentication.
